name: Blazing Tank
description:
Blazing Tank is an Action Pack top down shooter.Take control of a tank an and use its main turret and side mounted machine guns to lay waste to your enemies. Face off against Foot Soldiers, Enemy Tanks and forfeited bunkers.

At a later date an a additional bonus level will be added for not extra charge, until then i will update the game to fix any bugs that were unknown to me at the time of release.
